verbs.description: President Trump [V: should] be careful not to become a propaganda tool duing his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore , Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson said on " Fox News Sunday . "

[ARG1: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: be] [ARG2: careful not to become a propaganda tool duing his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson said on " Fox News Sunday . "

[ARG1: President Trump] should be careful [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: become] [ARG2: a propaganda tool duing his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson said on " Fox News Sunday . "

President Trump should be careful not to become [ARG0: a propaganda tool] [V: duing] [ARG1: his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson said on " Fox News Sunday . "

President Trump should be careful not to become a propaganda tool duing his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore , [ARG0: Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: on " Fox News] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] . "
